profile.description:
Hi and welcome to our cozy Echo Park pad. I grew up with a Westie, and do not currently have any pets. My husband (Brian) and I have always wanted to get a dog, but can't seem to keep a consistent schedule. So, the next best thing is watching other people's dogs! We love all sizes, sexes, and breeds. Our home is pet friendly, our porch is always locked and closed, along with the entire property being gated. Your pet can't escape!

I exercise daily, so I'd love to take your pup on a walk or run with me. We'd spend lots of time outside, but an equal amount of time cuddling inside. Echo Park Lake is less than a 10 minute walk from me, and I go to Silverlake Reservoir regularly, too. If he/she is here for the weekend, we usually take a road trip to go hiking. Your dog will always have an adventure at my house!

I can't believe I'm admitting this, but I tend to talk and sing to dogs just like they're people. Maybe cause I'm a therapist, maybe cause I'm a little crazy! I just want your dog to feel at home. :) We look forward to hosting your adorable pets!
profile.title: Dog lovers want to help you!

profile.description:
LEAVING TOWN LAST MINUTE? I CAN HELP!

HI! I'M PIPER, I LIVE IN DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES AND OFFER THE FOLLOWING:

- COMPASSIONATE AND EFFECTIVE CARE FOR YOUR PUP WHILE YOU ARE AT WORK OR PLAY INCLUDING DAILY WALKS, BOARDING AT YOUR HOME OR MINE AND TRAINING! 

-FREE PICK UP AND DROP OFF SERVICE!

- EXPERTISE OF BREED STANDARDS AND BEHAVIOR INCLUDING SHYNESS, AGGRESSION, SOCIALIZATION, SEPARATION ANXIETY, LEASH MANNERS AND CONFIDENCE BUILDING, ALL THROUGH THE USE OF POSITIVE REINFORCEMENT!

-EXPERT POTTY TRAINING TIPS!

- EXPERIENCE WITH CANINES OF ALL AGES AND TYPES INCLUDING: PUPPY, ADULT, SENIOR, SPECIAL NEEDS, SHELTER AND RESCUE DOGS!


-ON-SITE DOG PARK AND K-9 AGILITY COURSE!

-I ALSO WORK AS A CANINE MATCHMAKER TO HELP PEOPLE FIND THEIR PERFECT CANINE COMPANION!

-I PROVIDE CAT CARE AS WELL!

- FLEXIBLE AVAILABILITY INCLUDING WEEKENDS, HOLIDAYS AND LAST MINUTE!

-24 HR SUPERVISION!

YOU AND YOUR BUDDY WILL BE HAPPY YOU CALLED BUDDY'S BUDDY!

* Please note if booking for boarding I can only accept dogs 50lbs and under in my building.  However, I am more than happy to care for your dog over 50lbs as a dog sitter in your home.
profile.title: BUDDY'S BUDDY

profile.description:
I love pups of all ages and breeds and I am lucky to have grown up with multiple dogs in my home. I have a natural intuition that I have applied in my years as a pet care professional in a variety of environments and with dogs of many different temperaments.

Dogs are feeling beings, and I am very passionate about providing positive dog care. This is my full-time job, and I would be honored to join your family.  

I would love to host a fun and busy stay-cation for your pal! My home is very dog-friendly, and includes an enclosed, outdoor side-yard for playtime and much-needed bathroom breaks.

I'm available for slumber parties with your pooch in your home, and references can be provided from my current clients.

*While on a walk, I pledge my commitment to your pup's safety by silencing my cell phone and refusing to jaywalk.

*I do not keep my calendar updated here, as I find it an inaccurate representation of my availability. Please contact me directly.
profile.title: Doug's Dogs

profile.description:
This is a very happy home!  I have a tiny Maltese that likes other dogs.  Her name is Poco, because she's my "lil bit".  We do walks several times a day.  And play with toys.  I work from home, so am around for whatever your pooch needs.  Dog park a couple blocks away.

Meet and greets are encouraged and there is a small amount of paper work that needs to be filled out so Poco and I know all of your child's needs.

If the final stay day goes over the 24 hours we will want to discuss adding a day rate.

It is appreciated when scheduled times are kept firm.

The holiday rate is 1.5 times the normal rate.
profile.title: DTLA Little Tokyo Condo!

profile.description:
Note: I love cats and offer cat sitting as well as dog sitting! I'm happy to stay at your house or visit your kitty while you're away.

--

We're Andy and Marissa, and we'd love to take care of your dog! We live in Silver Lake just a block away from Sunset Junction.

We take our own pups, Juliet and Rascal, to the Silver Lake Dog Park a few times a week. 

Juliet is a sweetheart Siberian husky. She's six years old and very sweet. Rascal is a four year old chihuahua/dachshund mix who loves to play. Both are great with other dogs, especially small ones.

We're in an apartment right now, so can only take 1 additional dog (preferably on the smaller side) at a time. I can also offer in-home dog sitting and am open to multiple dogs/any size then!

Let us know if you have any questions!
profile.title: Silver Lake Puppy Palace!
